creator: Afrilearn
descriptionHtml:
Join thousands of star students to enjoy curriculum-relevant video lessons, rich class notes, official practice tests and live classes for superior school grades, academic success and best results in competitive exams like the WASSCE, GCE, NECO, JSSCE, UTME, POST-UTME and more.

Afrilearn provides personalized fun learning experience which helps you discover how you learn best, where to focus, and study at your own unique pace, on any device, anytime, anywhere,.

Afrilearn offers a vast library of advanced content covering all subjects across the Junior Secondary School classes including Mathematics, English Language, Basic Science & Technology, Agricultural Science, Business Studies, Civic Education, Computer Science, Christian Religious Studies, Cultural & Creative Arts, Home Economics, Physical & Health Education, Social Studies, alongside the Senior Secondary classes including Mathematics, English Language, Biology, Physics, Chemistry, Computer Science, Data Processing, Financial Accounts, Geography, Government, Literature in English, Agricultural Science, Economics, Commerce, Civic Education, Christian Religious Studies, with new content added every week.
Easily the best supplementary education resource created by top tutors across Africa, Afrilearn also empowers Teachers, Parents and Schools to drastically reduce workload, paper works and save time using world-class learning management system, pre-loaded content and analytic reports which help to optimize students’ learning progress in real time. Afrilearn’s ready-made advanced resources and digital tools make both classroom and remote learning highly engaging.

What you’ll love about Afrilearn:
• Interactive classes by Africa’s top teachers and celebrity tutors with engaging video lessons, class notes and personalised learning journeys.
• The more you learn, the better Afrilearn gets at recommending the best content you’ll love.
• Get ahead in class and ace exams like WAEC, JAMB, GCE, SSCE, JSSCE, BECE, POST-UTME and more with adaptive exercises and solutions that help you perfect your understanding.

• Analyse your progress, strengths, and areas of improvement through real-time analytic reports.
• Instantly resolve and clear all doubts by interacting with other students and get one-on-one guidance from a seasoned tutor.
• Save your data. Download content to learn offline, wherever you are. On the go? Listen to courses in audio-only mode.
For feedback and support, please send an email to hello@myafrilearn.com
Use Afrilearn on the Web at https://myafrilearn.com/

title: Free Class Notes, Videos, WAEC JAMB NECO, JSS1-SS3

creator: Afrilearn
descriptionHtml:
Enjoy Complete Primary & Secondary Education Online (Ages 6-18) for Best Grades and Success in life.

Join thousands of star students and enjoy full access to curriculum-specific class notes, game-learning challenge with cash rewards, official exam practice questions with solutions, richly animated video lessons and live classes to achieve superior results in competitive exams like the WASSCE, GCE, NECO, BECE, JSSCE, UTME, POST-UTME and more.

What you’ll love about Afrilearn:
• Pass WAEC, JAMB-UTME, NECO, BECE & more in one sitting.
• Full access to 50,000+ practice tests & solutions with Instant result.
• Fun learning with animated video lessons, class notes, live classes.
• Enter gamified learning challenge with friends to win weekly cash prizes.
• Get online Homework Help with Instant solutions from expert tutors.
• Discover your areas of strength with real-time analytics tools.
• Secure university admission and achieve unlimited success in life.

Access a vast library of exciting content covering all subjects across the Primary, Junior and Senior Secondary School classes including Mathematics, English Language, Basic Science & Technology, Agricultural Science, Business Studies, Civic Education, Christian Religious Studies, Cultural & Creative Arts, Home Economics, Physical & Health Education, Social Studies, Biology, Physics, Chemistry, Computer Science, Data Processing, Financial Accounts, Geography, Government, Literature in English, Economics, Commerce and more, with new content added every week.

As a great supplement to in-class learning with ready-made lesson notes, Afrilearn helps to improve the effectiveness of Teachers, Parents and Schools by freeing them from traditional lectures and giving them more time to tend to learners' needs.

Get ready for a personalised fun learning experience that helps you discover how you learn best, where to focus, and study at your own unique pace, on your own terms, anytime, anywhere.

For feedback and support, please send an email to care@myafrilearn.com
Use Afrilearn on the Web at https://myafrilearn.com/

title: Afrilearn: Get Better Results

creator: Afrilearn
descriptionHtml:
Top the class with the world’s first gamified learn-and-earn app. Afrilearn is the most effective educational learning app for Primary and Secondary School learners and candidates preparing for WAEC, GCSE, A levels, BECE, GCE, NECO, JAMB, and other National exams.

Download now and join the ranks of highly successful learners who trust Afrilearn to learn and understand difficult subjects easily, helping them achieve the best school grades.

🌟 Why Afrilearn?

• Stay motivated with game-like lessons, fun characters, and competitive leaderboards with rewards as you learn alongside our global community.
• Access the most comprehensive curriculum-based class notes library.
• Get instant homework help with AskAfri’s step-by-step explanations.
• Conquer WAEC, JAMB-UTME, NECO, BECE, and more in one go.
• Access 100,000+ practice tests and detailed solutions with instant results.
• Compete with other learners to earn points, top the leaderboard, and make money.
• Enjoy animated and storified video lessons aligned with national curricula.
• Learn how to code in basic trending programming languages for free.
• Track your progress and strength with powerful real-time analytics.
• Secure your university admission and achieve limitless success.
• Achieve up to a 150% increase in test scores within a week, like over 80% of Afrilearn users.

Discover a personalised learning journey that adapts to your unique style, enabling you to study at your own pace, anywhere, anytime, on any device, whether in or out of the classroom.

Embrace a brighter future. Download the App now to start learning for free.

Designed by education experts and loved by millions of learners worldwide, Afrilearn also supports teachers and schools by offering ready-made lesson notes, giving them more time to cater to the individual needs of learners.

Gain full access to a vast library of engaging content covering all subjects across the Primary, Junior, and Senior Secondary School classes including Mathematics, English Language, Basic Science and Technology, Agricultural Science, Business Studies, Civic Education, Christian Religious Studies, Cultural and Creative Arts, Home Economics, Physical & Health Education, Social Studies, Biology, Physics, Chemistry, Computer Science, Data Processing, Financial Accounts, Geography, Government, Literature in English, Economics, Commerce and more, with new content added every week.

What the world is saying about Afrilearn⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️:
“Fun and effective education for Africans anywhere.” — Forbes
“Adaptive learning, aligned with national curricula.” — UNICEF

For feedback and support, please send an email to hello@myafrilearn.com
Use Afrilearn on the Web at https://myafrilearn.com/
Privacy Policy: https://www.myafrilearn.com/privacy
descriptionShort: Get top grades with the free, fun app for primary and secondary school learners.

title:

creator: Afrilearn
descriptionHtml:
Top your class easily with the most effective app for academic success!

Afrilearn is the best-loved learn-and-earn app, offering a free, fun, and effective educational experience for secondary and primary school learners. Whether you’re preparing for class, WAEC, GCSE, A levels, BECE, GCE, NECO, JAMB, or other national exams, Afrilearn has you covered with complete class notes, videos, homework help, JAMB CBT, WAEC past questions, and more 24/7.

🌟 Why Choose Afrilearn?

• Access the most detailed and curriculum-based class notes library.
• Get quick homework help with AskAfri’s step-by-step explanations & answers.
• Enjoy animated, story-based video lessons that make learning enjoyable.
• Conquer WAEC, JAMB-UTME, NECO, BECE, and more in one sitting.
• Access over 100,000 practice tests with detailed solutions and instant results.
• Learn how to code in basic trending programming languages for free.
• Use real-time analytics to monitor your strengths and areas for improvement.
• Boost your test scores by up to 150% in a week, like 80% of Afrilearn users.
• Compete with peers to earn points, top leaderboard, and even make money.
• Top your class, secure university admission and achieve lifelong success.

Join millions of students who trust Afrilearn to help them understand challenging subjects and achieve top grades with ease.

Personalised Learning Just for You
Experience a learning journey tailored to your unique style, allowing you to study at your own pace, anywhere, anytime, on any device. Whether you’re in the classroom or on the go, Afrilearn adapts to your needs.

Created by education experts and loved by learners worldwide, Afrilearn also supports teachers and schools by providing ready-made lesson notes, giving them more time to focus on individual student needs.

Access a vast library of engaging content for all subjects in Primary, Junior, and Senior Secondary School, including Mathematics, English Language, Basic Science and Technology, Agricultural Science, Business Studies, Civic Education, Christian Religious Studies, Cultural and Creative Arts, Home Economics, Physical & Health Education, Social Studies, Biology, Physics, Chemistry, Computer Science, Data Processing, Financial Accounts, Geography, Government, Literature in English, Economics, Commerce, and more. New content is added weekly to keep you ahead.

What Others Are Saying About Afrilearn ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
“Fun and effective education for Africans anywhere.” — Forbes
“Adaptive learning, aligned with national curricula.” — UNICEF

Embrace a brighter future. Download the App now to start learning for free!

For feedback and support, please email us at hello@myafrilearn.com.
Use Afrilearn on the Web at myafrilearn.com
